00036 /*======================= Helper Functions ==========================*/
00037 /* LSM_FMM_ABS() computes the absolute value of its argument.        */
00038 /* This macro is defined so that LSMLIB does not have to rely on the */
00039 /* C math library.                                                   */
00040 #define LSM_FMM_ABS(x)            ((x) > 0 ? (x) : -1.0*(x))
00041 
00042 /*
00043  * LSM_FMM_IDX() computes the array index for the specified 
00044  * grid index and grid dimensions.
00045  *
00046  * Arguments:
00047  *   idx (out):       array index
00048  *   grid_idx (in):   grid index
00049  *   grid_dims (in):  grid dimensions
00050  * 
00051  * NOTES:
00052  *  (1) idx MUST be a valid l-value.
00053  *  (2) FMM_NDIM MUST be defined by user code.
00054  *
00055  */
00056 #define LSM_FMM_IDX(idx, grid_idx, grid_dims)                            \
00057 {                                                                        \
00058   int lsm_fmm_dir;                                                       \
00059   int grid_size_lower_dims = 1;                                          \
00060   idx = 0;                                                               \
00061   for (lsm_fmm_dir = 0; lsm_fmm_dir < FMM_NDIM; lsm_fmm_dir++) {         \
00062     idx += grid_idx[lsm_fmm_dir]*grid_size_lower_dims;                   \
00063     grid_size_lower_dims *= grid_dims[lsm_fmm_dir];                      \
00064   }                                                                      \
00065 }
00066 
00067 /*
00068  * LSM_FMM_IDX_OUT_OF_BOUNDS() determines whether the given 
00069  * grid index lies in the computational domain.
00070  *
00071  * Arguments:
00072  *   result (out):    1 if grid index is out of bounds; 0 otherwise.
00073  *   grid_idx (in):   grid index
00074  *   grid_dims (in):  grid dimensions
00075  * 
00076  * NOTES:
00077  *  (1) result MUST be a valid l-value.
00078  *  (2) FMM_NDIM MUST be defined by user code.
00079  *
00080  */
00081 #define LSM_FMM_IDX_OUT_OF_BOUNDS(result, grid_idx, grid_dims)           \
00082 {                                                                        \
00083   int lsm_fmm_dir;                                                       \
00084   result = 0;                                                            \
00085   for (lsm_fmm_dir = 0; lsm_fmm_dir < FMM_NDIM; lsm_fmm_dir++) {         \
00086     if (  (grid_idx[lsm_fmm_dir]<0)                                      \
00087        || (grid_idx[lsm_fmm_dir]>grid_dims[lsm_fmm_dir]-1) ) {           \
00088       result = 1;                                                        \
00089       break;                                                             \
00090     }                                                                    \
00091   }                                                                      \
00092 }
